  • Method Details

    • storeQValue

      public abstract boolean storeQValue​(State state, java.lang.String action, float value)
      Update value. This method will update the value for the action for the state. If the state does not exist, create a new state. If the action does not exist create a new action with value
      Parameters:
      state - the state
      action - the action
      value - the value
      Returns:
      true, if successful

    • getQValue

      action - the action
      Returns:
      float - QValue
